title: Part motion given logarithmic velocity f part - b

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity v at time t, for 0≤t≤5 , is given by v(t)=ln(t2-3t+3). The particle is at position x=8 at time t=0.
content.question: Find all times t in the open interval 0<t<5 at which the particle changes direction. During which time intervals, for 0≤t≤5 , does the particle travel to the left?

frqParts.text: Find all times t in the open interval 0<t<5 at which the particle changes direction. During which time intervals, for 0≤t≤5 , does the particle travel to the left?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify common underlying structures in problems involving different contextual situations.
